name: Critter Safari
description: Create a game in the style of rock, paper, scissors where animals interact and have rock, paper, scissors battles.

name: MVC with Shapes
description: Learn the Model-View-Controller framework by drawing shapes.

name: MVC with Diamonds and Plusses
description: Learn the Model-View-Controller framework by drawing shapes.

name: Text-based Adventure Game
description: Learn how to work with File I/O by creating a text-based adventure game defined by .txt files.

name: A Really Big Integer
description: Create a class to handle large integers and learn about the binary number system.

name: Anagram Solver
description: Use recursive backtracing to find all possible anagrams of a word or phrase.

name: File Compression with the Huffman Algorithm
description: Use binary trees and priority queues to compress a text file.

name: Extra Credit: An Improvement to the Huffman Assignment
description: Consolidate the code file and binary file from Assignment 7
